text: "Black Hole Sun" is a 1994 grunge song by the American grunge band Soundgarden, from their fourth studio album Superunknown, which was released in 1994. The song was written by Chris Cornell. It is a playable song in the video game, Rock Band. The song won the Grammy Award for Best Hard Rock Performance and it was also nominated for Best Rock Song. The music video for Black Hole Sun won a MTV Video Music Award for Best Metal/Hard Rock Video in 1994. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Soundgarden songs Category:1994 songs Category:Grammy Award-winning songs Category:Psychedelic rock songs Category:Alternative rock songs
title: Black Hole Sun
